item.title: Crushing the Certified Jenkins Engineer (CJE) exam
item.description: Last summer, I decided to take the Certified Jenkins Engineer (CJE) exam. I have years of experience with Jenkins as developer managing my own jobs as well as Jenkins administrator. Aquiring the certification sounded like a good idea to prove my proficiency with the subject. To pass the exam, you have to understand theoretical and practical aspects of CI/CD. The main focus of the certification lies on operating Jenkins pipelines and maintaining them in the context of a larger organization.
